title: Why Most Budgeting Apps Suck
snippet: I've tried every app from Mint to YNAB. Here's what actually works.
body: After years of testing budgeting apps, I've found that most fail to address the real needs of users. They either overcomplicate the process or don't provide enough insight into spending habits. The key is simplicity and actionable insights. Apps that focus on these aspects tend to be more effective in helping users manage their finances.
